BIO

After spending 18 years as a physical therapist, I wanted to return to my roots in math and logic and develop the skills needed to become a web developer. With these skills, I hope to create apps that will help PTs and their patients.

2020 - Current

University of Wisconsin, Madison

Adjunct Instructor for Online Full Stack Bootcamp

I am assisting in the testing of the curriculum for the upcoming launch of our online Full Stack Bootcamp. I am also a lead instructor for the introduction courses including (html, css, javascript, git and github)

2020 - 2021

Freelance Developer

Full Stack Developer

Always looking for interesting work, especially when I need to learn a new technology to be successful.

2010 - 2018

ProMotion PT, LLC

Owner and Physical Therapist

Over 18 years of being a PT, I not only taught patients to become independent in managing their symptoms, but I also managed a group of 13 PTs and PTAs, and branched out and opened my own clinic to treat people in my neighborhood and the underserved.
